channel.title: Allow use of a item after 'X' Amount of In-game time? Help!?!?!?!
channel.description: I've worked on adding a ingame time counter, really easy. blah blah blah. I've also added a Veteran cape, seeing how my server goes on tomorrow. I'm giving it all players that helped before it goes online. After this, is there a way i can give it to everyone who has played say a hundred or so hours? Thanks.

item.title: Allow use of a item after 'X' Amount of In-game time? Help!?!?!?!
item.dc:creator: @RSPS222 RSPS222
item.description:
@RSPS222 wrote:

Well You can do something like this :

if(System.currentTimeMillis() < 360000000){ //The 360000000 its 100 hours addItem(Itemid of the veteran cape.,amount); }
Again maybe it’s not hole of the code but I think it’s a start.

Read full topic
item.source: Allow use of a item after 'X' Amount of In-game time? Help!?!?!?!
